newsitem.title: USA: ESS Technology to supply Sony.
newsitem.headline: ESS Technology to supply Sony.

text.p: ESS Technology Inc Wednesday said Sony Corp selected ESS' MPEG solution for a new video related product.

In addition, the company said Eastbase of Hong Kong as well as an affiliate of South Korea's LG Group and 16 other Video CD player manufacturers in China, Taiwan, and Hong Kong have selected ESS' MPEG-1 decoder solution.

ESS also said the company has also shipped half a million units of its ES3204 chip, a highly integrated single-chip MPEG-1 video, audio, and system decoder ahead of schedule. The milestone was originally targeted for the first quarter of 1997.
ESS designs, develops and markets highly integrated mixed signal semiconductor and software solutions for multimedia applications in the personal computer and consumer marketplaces.
